titles.title: A bill to permit the Secretary of Agriculture to exchange certain lands in the Wenatachee National Forest, Washington, for certain lands owned by Public Utility District No. 1 of Chelan County, Washington, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S7963)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: 6/29/1994--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of Agriculture to exchange certain lands in the Wenatachee National Forest, Washington, for certain lands owned by Public Utility District No. 1 (District) of Chelan County, Washington. Includes in such exchange a conveyance by the Secretary to the District of a specified wastewater treatment facility.
